articles.title: Carnival Stock (CCL) Tumbles as Quarterly Results Fail to Impress Investors - Bloomberg
articles.description: Carnival Corp. shares tumbled by the most in more than seven months after the cruise-ship operator reported quarterly results and an annual forecast that failed to keep pace with the high expectations that had fueled a sharp rally in the stock.
